name: Abated Mass of Flesh
description: '''Abated Mass of Flesh''' is an American [[brutal death metal]] band formed in [[Murfreesboro, Tennessee]], in 2011. The band consists of vocalist Matthew Plunkett, guitarist Zack Plunkett, bassist Grant Alan and drummer Topher Stanfield. They have been compared to [[Dying Fetus]], [[Impending Doom]] and [[Crimson Thorn]].
